reviews.text:
I only have wonderful review for the team from Magicseal!! Bryan did an on site assessment & quotation. I shared with him that i prefer to install my Magicseal outside the windows, as I‚Äôve sliding windows and I stay first floor.
Bryan gave his professional advice, suggesting what kind of frame and to install on which window panel so as not to block the view!
The fabrication of the product didn‚Äôt take long, only took roughly a week!
Mr Yong & Mr Chong did a fabulous work on site! the team is efficient, with good workmanship. I‚Äôd highly recommend Magicseal!! üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

The great team from MagicSeal Bryan, Selim & Daniel
From the quotation to installation. Bryan came very prepared with samples, patiently addressing all my questions & concern. Plus I  get an instant quote. Selim & Daniel installation team are awesome. Very careful and efficient. Highly recommend . All done in half an hour

Excellent service from Salim and Daniel!
I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the installation experience. Daniel and Salim were not only skilled and efficient but also incredibly friendly and respectful throughout the entire process. They showed up right on time, explained everything clearly, and made sure I was happy with the setup before they left. It‚Äôs rare to find professionals who care this much about their work and customer satisfaction. Big thanks to both of them‚ÄîI‚Äôd gladly recommend them to anyone!

Wei Ping was prompt in response on quotation and swift measurement schedule. He‚Äôs very knowledgeable and confident in his products. Installer Lun did a fantastic job too! He arrived early and waited patiently for me to return home. He‚Äôs efficient and skillful. Good job and Great Teamwork! Highly recommended!

Mr Salim and Mr Yong assisted me in replacing my diy insect mesh. The both of them are knowledgeable and professional. They understand their product and performed their service real well. They are punctual, polite and patient with me as I had a lot of questions. Work done was neat, clean and efficient. Appreciate them for their great services and professionalism.
